name: Kairat Nurtas
description: '''Kairat Nurtas'''{{efn|alternatively spelled '''Qairat''', {{langx|kk|Қайрат Нұртас|translit=Qairat Nūrtas}}, {{IPA|kk|qɑjˈrɑt no̙rtʰɑs|}}; born '''Kairat Nurtasuly Aydarbekov''', {{langx|kk|Қайрат Нұртасұлы Айдарбеков|translit=Qairat Nūrtasūly Aidarbekov}}}} (born 25 February 1989) is a Kazakh singer. He has topped the rating of the most popular local Kazakh musicians, based on CD sales.
